column1: * 1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Jane Neave (22 September 1937).
* 1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts writing Letter to Eileen Elgar (September 1963).
* 1976 - Actor and stuntman Sala Baker is born.
* 1981 - The Dutch Tolkien Societies Unquendor is founded in wikipedia:Leiden
* 2003 - The Eleventy-First Birthday Party is held in wikipedia:Frankenmuth
* 2009 - The Frisian translation of The Hobbit
* 2010 - The Lonely Mountain Band release their first album Beyond the Western Seas.
** Bilbo Baggins and Thorin and Company arrive in Lake-town.
** Bilbo Baggins turns 111 and throws the Bilbos Farewell Party at which he announces his intention to leave the Shire. He leaves behind the One Ring and sets off.
** Frodo Baggins turns 33 and comes of age. He inherits Bag End and all the things Bilbo leaves behind.
** The Nazgûl reach Sarn Ford at evening and drive off the guard of Rangers of the North.
** Frodo celebrates his birthday with Fredegar Bolger
column4: Samwise Gamgee and Folco Boffin. Merry and Fredegar leave for Crickhollow.
